quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"jaw"（下巴）的名词含义，误解"to jaw"为与下巴相关的动作（如咀嚼、推搡），而非口语化的"唠叨"。
quiz_item.sentence: My grandma loves to **jaw** about her childhood stories for hours, even if no one is really listening.

option.definition: to talk continuously in a boring or annoying way（连续说无聊或烦人的话）
to chew food with the teeth（用牙齿咀嚼食物）
to push something using the jaw（用下巴推某物）
to yawn widely with the mouth open（张大嘴打哈欠）
